Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute at Congress Plaza
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are rrtd via Michigan, Harrison (Layover), (after layover) Wabash & State due to street blockage near Congress Plaza.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Harrison (Layover), (after layover) Wabash and State due to street blockage near Congress Plaza.

Allow extra travel time.
